About

"”If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?” And whenever the answer has been “No” for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.” – Steve Jobs

Career

  • February 2015 - Today

    bike2go is a passion project to create an iOS application for Philadelphia bike share users to find stations, racks, and bikes.

  • September 2014 - Today

    AWeber Atom is an app for AWeber customers to add new subscribers to their list.

  • November 2013 - Today

    AWeber Stats is an app for AWeber customers to use to view analytics and stats about their lists on the go.

  • January 2011 - September 2011

    Vanguard Advisors is an app providing content for financial advisors.

  • May 2008 - September 2011

    The flagship app for Vanguard, used for viewing account balances and making financial transations.
